TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataRowExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DataRowExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 定义 类的扩展方法。

span.span: Defines the extension methods to the class.

summary.span: 这是一个静态类。

span.span: This is a static class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的两个新方法已扩展 API类，和。The API has been extended with two new methods of the class, and . 你可以使用这些到窗体[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]表达式和针对方法查询对象。You can use these to form [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries against objects. 它们是推荐的方法，用于访问中的列值[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]表达式和方法的查询。They are the recommended methods to use for accessing column values within [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries. 有关详细信息，请参阅[泛型字段和 SetField 方法](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Generic Field and SetField Methods](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md).

summary.span: 提供对 中的每个列值的强类型访问。

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the .

MemberSignature.Value: public static T Field<T> (this System.Data.DataRow row, System.Data.DataColumn column);
.method public static hidebysig !!T Field<T>(class System.Data.DataRow row, class System.Data.DataColumn column) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Field(Of T) (row As DataRow, column As DataColumn) As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定列的返回类型的泛型形参。

span.span: A generic parameter that specifies the return type of the column.

param.span: 输入 ，作为扩展方法的 实例。

span.span: The input , which acts as the instance for the extension method.

param.name: column
param.span: 输入 对象，该对象指定要返回其值的列。

span.span: The input object that specifies the column to return the value of.

summary.span: 为指定行中的每个列值提供强类型访问。

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the specified row.

summary.span: 方法还支持可以为 null 的类型。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

returns.span: 由 指定的 类型的 值。

span.span: The value, of type , of the specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示**null**值与实例类。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. A[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]访问具有的列的表达式**null**值也会生成在运行时。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外，不支持可以为 null 的类型。Additionally, does not support nullable types. 方法提供支持，用于访问为 null 的类型的列。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果基础值中是，返回 null 的类型将具有的值**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定的值是和`T`是引用类型或可以为 null 的类型，则返回类型将是**null**。If the value of the specified is and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, the return type will be **null**. 方法不会返回。The method will not return . 方法不执行类型转换。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果类型转换是必需的你首先获取列的值使用方法。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 然后，该列的值应转换为另一种类型中。The column value should then be converted to another type.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

exception.span: 指定的列不会出现在包含 的 中。

span.span: The column specified by does not occur in the that the is a part of.

exception.span: 将“null”值赋给了不可为 null 的类型。

span.span: A **null** value was assigned to a non-nullable type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示**null**值与实例类。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. A[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]访问具有的列的表达式**null**值也会生成在运行时。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外，不支持可以为 null 的类型。Additionally, doesn’t support nullable types. 方法提供支持，用于访问为 null 的类型的列。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果基础值中是，返回 null 的类型将具有的值**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定的值是**null**和`T`是引用类型或可以为 null 的类型，则返回类型将**null**。If the value of the specified is **null** and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, then the return type will be **null**. 方法不会返回。The method will not return . 方法不执行类型转换。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果类型转换是必需的你首先获取列的值使用方法。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 然后，该列的值应转换为另一种类型中。The column value should then be converted to another type.

summary.span: 方法还支持可以为 null 的类型。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是**null**、方法将**null**值赋给中基础。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 无法通过执行类型转换对象和转换后的值随后将保存到的行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以通过向上传递异常方法从基础对象。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

span.span: The name of the column to set the value of.

param.name: value
param.span: 指定列的新行值，类型为 T。

span.span: The new row value for the specified column, of type T.

summary.span: 为 中的指定列设置一个新值。

span.span: Sets a new value for the specified column in the .

summary.span: 方法还支持可以为 null 的类型。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是**null**、方法将**null**值赋给中基础。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 无法通过执行类型转换对象和转换后的值随后将保存到的行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以通过向上传递异常方法从基础对象。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 找不到由 指定的列。

span.span: The column specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: 尝试对已删除的行设置值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: 基础列的值类型无法转换为泛型参数 指定的类型。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .
